Reviews.Title: Genuine Geovision Card
Reviews.Author: jay964
Reviews.Content: Genuine Geovision card.  Best DVR cards in the industry and well worth the price.  If you need a card for your DVR needs I highly recommend geovision.

Reviews.Title: upgrade
Reviews.Author: Marvin Roberts Jr
Reviews.Content: this unit has more CH then the one i have and more audio and high guality for better vuwing and long range

ProductInfo.Name: GEOVISION DVR card, GV-800B 16CH, 120 FPS live display record playback
